casebody.data:
NEW JERSEY SPORTS AND EXPOSITION AUTHORITY, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
TOWN OF KEARNY, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
State of New Jersey, By and Through The Tidelands Resource Council, Theodore C. Wildman, and All of His Heirs, Successors and Assigns, Mimi Development Corporation, Its Successor Hudson Meadows Urban Renewal Development Corporation, and Its Further Successor, Sonee Urban Renewal Corporation, Defendants. C-658 September Term 2017
080478 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 9, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005152-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
